title: Abenime Spa
description: Thermal suites, hydrotherapy pools, and tailored coastal botanicals for deep restoration.

title: Tide & Ember Dining
description: Seasonal tasting menus with open-fire cooking and ocean produce, paired by our sommeliers.

title: Curated Stays
description: Private sail charters, sunrise yoga on the dunes, and atelier tours planned by our concierge.

title: Quiet Work Lounges
description: Acoustic pods, ocean light, and crafted coffee service for guests working remotely.
